about_the_game:
Explore the tales of a boundlessly creative universe's overarching story through team-building strategy gameplay that explores the many stories that occupy this universe. Acquire a wide variety of unique characters that exist within the history of this universe through a non-microtransaction gacha system that you can cheat. Bring together a team of various units as you face off against foes of all sorts in a roguelike manner that allows you to build your teams up between battles and prepare you for some of the harsh foes or perilous predicaments that linger ahead. 

Features

  • Turn-based tactical strategy gameplay as you face off against perilous predicaments and foes alike.

  • Various different stories brought to life within these adventures you'll be playing through, telling the brief tales of major events that happen within this universe.

  • A microtransactionsless gacha system, that you can cheat, that allows you to acquire several new characters to add to your team.

  • A wide variety of abilities to choose from to add to your character's already premade set of 4 abilities.

  • Items to further customize each character's builds and expand their horizons.

  • All sorts of different unique characters to choose from and enjoy the stories of.

  • Challenge variants of adventures that you've cleared.
